deletekey.name: DeleteKey
deletekey.description: Grants permission to delete the key value pair specified by the key

describekeyvaluestore.name: DescribeKeyValueStore
describekeyvaluestore.description: Grants permission to return metadata information about Key Value Store

getkey.name: GetKey
getkey.description: Grants permission to return a key value pair

listkeys.name: ListKeys
listkeys.description: Grants permission to returns a list of key value pairs

putkey.name: PutKey
putkey.description: Grants permission to create a new key value pair or replace the value of an existing key

updatekeys.name: UpdateKeys
updatekeys.description: Grants permission to put or delete multiple key value pairs in a single, all-or-nothing operation
